references.paper_title: Blended diffusion for text-driven editing of natural images
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it introduces a diffusion-based approach to image editing, which is the foundation of the proposed method in this paper.

references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces an instruction-following approach to image editing, which is a key component of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Putting people in their place: Affordance-aware human insertion into scenes
references.reason: This paper is directly relevant as it introduces the concept of affordance-aware human insertion which is a key component of this paper's proposed method.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces the latent diffusion model, which is the foundation of the proposed method in this paper.
